name: Fried Rice
ingredients:
2 cups rice
4 cups water
2/3 cup chopped carrots
1/2 cup frozen peas
2 tbsp vegetable oil
soy sauce to taste
sesame oil to taste
directions:
1. Combine rice and water in a pot. Bring to a boil. Cover, and simmer 15 minutes. Remove from heat and rest 5 minutes. Remove cover, fluff with a fork and let stand 5 minutes.
2. While rice is cooking, boil carrots 3 - 5 minutes. Drop peas into boiling water once carrots are done. Drain.
3. Heat pan with oil.
4. Fry carrots and peas about 30 seconds.
5. Crack in eggs, quickly stir to scramble.
6. Add soy sauce, stir to coat.
7. Remove from heat, drizzle with sesame oil and serve.
